name: LoanTube
slogan: making real rate loan comparison possible!!
description:
LoanTube is a global FinTech startup which is a Real-Rate loan comparison marketplace. By comparing loans with real rates, we mean the rate you see on LoanTube is the rate you will get in reality from our lenders.
We operate one of the most complex marketplaces in the world and we do this in real time. Thousands of customers and a big panel of lenders rely on us to match them within milliseconds. The algorithms behind our marketplace are the secret sauce that allow us to find bespoke loan deals for our customers with real interest rates from multiple lenders within a minute.

In short, what you see on our website is what you get in real.

Searching for the cheapest loan on LoanTube is as simple as searching for a cheapest flight ticket on a flight comparison website.

jobs.title: Chief Credit Risk Officer (Loan Comparison marketplace - LoanTube)
jobs.description:

jobs.title: Chief Information Officer/ Technical Head/ VP of Engineering
jobs.description:
Role: VP of Engineering/ CIO/ Technical Head    

Key Highlights: 
1. You will be responsible for Product Planning, research, gathering resources and final Product Development and will be part of our Software development team, engaged in developing next generation real rate comparison marketplace for loans using C#, .Net, MVC5, Web API 2, Secure Integration with 3rd Party APIs, High Volume Public website, which includes money transfer features. 
2. You will be responsible for building a highly sophisticated matching engine to match borrowers & lenders. 
3. You will be engaged in designing and implementing high performing, scalable and quality web applications required to process the loan applications. 
4. Understand and able to explain to the team the importance of principles of good software design and development so that we are able to produce software of the highest possible quality in the fastest possible manner.
5. You will be dealing with multiple lenders (and possibly at the same time) to understand their product features and fit them into our hosted platform.
6.  You will responsible to complete the tasks/development/integrations on time and answerable to the board.
7. You should be willing to travel abroad as and when required for the company's business.      

Skill Set Required: 
1. Must be very good in thinking analytically. 
2. Must have minimum experience of 5 years in Microsoft .Net technology with C# and 3 year experience in MVC5 & Web API2 
3. Must be well versed in Ajax, JQuery. Experience in Angular is preferred.
4. Must have at least 3 year experience of working in MySQL 
5. Well versed with Security challenges in a Financial website 
6. Experience in Lending or Financial domain is must. 
7. Should be Go Getter and self motivated.

jobs.title: CEO / COO / Operations Head for global FinTech startup - A Real rate Loan Comparison marketplace
jobs.description:
Job Responsibilities.

You will be responsible for such duties as are normally associated with such position including, but not limited to the following:

1.	Represent the Employer wherever is needed for the business of the Employer.
2.	Gather resources, knowledge, and research the market to define a right product mix for the market.
3.	Meeting with potential service providers, clients, business partners, lenders, advisors, consultants, employees, taking interviews, performing negotiations with them as required in the interest of the Employer. 
4.	Lead the Product and define short & long term vision for the product.
5.	Make product blue-prints, explain the features to internal and external teams to ensure product’s success.
6.	Work closely with technology teams to ensure new strategies & product features are implemented accurately.
7.	Defining USPs, showcasing them to lending team and clients.
8.	Ensuring adherence to risk, regulatory & compliance requirements related to the product & the business.
9.	Ensure the business is compliant with marketing & regulatory requirements both under ASA and FCA.
10.	Build business strategies & plans, lead operations for UK, make relations with different Lenders. 
11.	Find opportunities to display LoanTube in places like Startup events and FinTech events.
12.	Find the investors and showcase the business to them in order to raise the investment.
13.	Establish strategic partnerships with other companies in order to reach the ambitious user growth targets.
14.	Ensure company objectives and standards of performance are not only understood but owned by management and employees in all departments.
15.	Raise company profile and build brand by attending and speaking at industry events.
16.	Stay updated with industry trends and competitors and come up with fresh ideas that will set the company apart from competitors.
17.	Launch new features of the product in market.
18.	Be thought leader.
19.	Committing yourself to the business of the Employer with integrity, dedication, determination & honesty.

Note: Your prior experience of working for FinTechs, Banks, Marketplaces, Loan industry will be preferred.

jobs.title: Brand & Marketing Research Internship/Management Training- UK Based FinTech Startup
jobs.description:
LoanTube is running a 6 months intense internship/management training programme for high calibre students & recent graduates. You will be given the taste of the world's most regulated financial industry – The United Kingdom . You will also have the chance to deal with UK based associates & clients. 

The intern will have the opportunity to experience and gain a better understanding of brand marketing, both generally and in relation to the loan & FinTech sectors specifically. You will grow  presence across the UK, you will have the opportunity to support the marketing initiatives in the UK. You'll work closely to understand some of the blockers our customers and lenders face and bring your insights to shape our marketing activities.

Key responsibilities of the role include:
•	Research the market, bring deep consumer insights to shape marketing activities in order to support & grow LoanTube’s business in UK market.
•	Develop marketing messages, copy for newsletters, leaflets, social media etc ensuring all collateral is approved.
•	Contribute to the on-going monitoring and review of activities including website traffic, and to suggest improvements and/or changes using your analytical skills.
•	Contribute to the development of a digital marketing strategy, including social media.
•	Research & reverse engineer algorithms of big publishing/High DA websites/platforms.
•	Keep an eye on loan industry trends and current affairs.
•	Find content opportunities based on Trending KWs, customer search queries, recent geo-political events & their impact on Lending industry and write research based articles.
•	Become LoanTube brand ambassadors on Social Media, make connections & relationships with influencers.


We are looking for:
•	Students & recent graduates in Marketing, Journalism, Data Science, Engineering and Management from reputed institutions.
•	Strong interest or understanding of marketing, digital media and brand management.
•	High attention to detail and process driven
•	Academic excellence at all stages throughout school and University education with a passion for research and innovation
•	Technical curiosity, creativity, innovation, initiative, communication, leadership and your collaboration skills.
•	Evidence of passion and achievements, particularly leadership, in academic and/or non- academic activities, short work experience or internships are a plus.
•	Fluent written English language skills
•	Exceptional communication and organisational skills


During your internship, your performance will be monitored & measured. Best performing interns will be offered a permanent position in our young & dynamic global Fintech company.

jobs.title: Internet Marketing Manager/ SEO Manager - Global FinTech startup
jobs.description:
Key Job Responsibilities:
1. Define the company’s growth plan.
2. Coordinate and execute growth programs.
3. Help the company to quantify and understand progress against marketing goals. (This task is accomplished through the selection of key performance indicators, and the development of reports on these metrics for consumption across the organization.)
4. Provide customer insight, by blending data with a deep understanding of user needs, habits, and perceptions developed through industry & competitors research, customer usability studies, and customer feedback.
5. You need to make sure the right data infrastructure is in place. Use the data you collect to create customer personas, improve revenues and minimize costs and expenditures where possible. Answer all the “whys” with the data you gather. For instance: Why are users dropping out of the sign up page?
6. Design and implement tests. Define growth objective and prioritize Roadmap of ideas to test in order to achieve such growth objectives. Work with product development team to implement the changes required for Test & Growth.
7. Set achievable company growth goals, and then set about making them happen.

4. Brand building on all SMO platforms

· Sound knowledge of SEO techniques & tricks.
